title: Ramazan Gül
text: Ramazan Gül (born 14 February 1967) is a Turkish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201988%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Flyweight">men's flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1988 Summer Olympics, he defeated <a href="John%20Lyon%20%28boxer%29">John Lyon</a> of Great Britain, before losing to <a href="Gamal%20El-Din%20El-Koumy">Gamal El-Din El-Koumy</a> of Egypt.
